import React from "react" import IndexSlider from "./ImageSilder" import IndexMenu from "./Indexmenu" import "./index.scss" import { foodmenu } from "../utlis/data" const Index = () => { let num = 0 const numchanger = () => { console.log(num) num >= foodmenu.length - 1 ? (num = 0) : num++ return foodmenu[num].img } setInterval(numchanger, 1000) return (
{/* foodmenu.map(item => ( )) */}
) } export default Index
